reference.title: My First Reference
reference.shortdesc: Laser D and SAS Macros are essential products in the Laser D project.

section.p: Here are basic details about Laser D and SAS Macros:

dlentry.dd:
Laser D is a computer-based storage that provides access to corporate documents filed with the SEC.
You can find more on Laser D in C:\Users\J.Madrid\Downloads\LaserD.

dd.p: SAS Macros avoids repetitive sections of code and allows them to be resused again when needed.
SAS Macros does the "dirty" work of automating the extraction of millions of corporate document files.
